item.description: A note with the word "Memories" written in it. It also has my name in it... Davi.
A cloak from a Cult member. It's covered in blood.
A key. It's in good condition. It must unlock one of the hundreds of thousands of doors in this city.
The tattoo on your chest is exactly like the symbol painted on the wall.
This photograph shows people in some kind of ceremony. They are all wearing white and black cloaks. I'm the one in the middle.
A long-sleeved black garment i found in the Abandoned House. It has 8 strokes on the back. It seems to belong to someone, the smell of the armpits proves it.
This item fell out of the suit of the parliamentarian who tried to immobilize me. It has a symbol of a snake.
A 200 Rukh bill (ɻ$200), the currency used in Harkan. It's a high-value bill. It can buy many things, including some “favors.”
It's an authorization for holding an event at the Cult Headquarters. That's my signature, and below it is my name and my position: 8th Assembly Brother.
This necklace was at the crime scene, lying on the ground. I don't recognize this symbol, it looks like something from another country.

This report refers to the murder of Amber Nikolsi. The police know it was around 9 PM yesterday, her belongings were stolen, suspected robbery, her body dumped was dumped in a bush, and the murderer acted on their own.
This card was given by Parliamentarian Hemer Valinksiy. He is a subordinate of Jacob and part of the reformist faction of the Cult. Here are his contact details.
This bag definitely belonged to Amber Nikolsi, the documents inside prove it. It was thrown in the Cult's depot.
Jacob noticed that there is an amount of ɻ$889 not declared here. This doesn't add up. There are also official documents in here.
Here is our proof. The Cult is conspirating with Kakim to overthrow the government. Let's take it back to the authorities.
